column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The ambience of the place is extremely laid back
column3: the staff is super friendly. Based on this alone
column4: Common Bond is worth the visit to pack on some calories and not be judged by how many treats you pile on your plate
column5: or how long it takes you to order it. There is plenty of seating
column6: and a great place to people watch as you down a cup of coffee.
